ComicInfo.Summary: Al Perry dreams how his appearance on a TV quiz show will go, and at first everything seems to be going as dreamed. But when reality diverges from the dream, Perry takes his winnings and goes home.
ComicInfo.Title: Mr. Miggs from Mercury!; The Man from Ancient Greece!; A Question of $64,000!
